text: Sure handling cases or deals can be major wake-up calls but have you ever dealt with a complex urban planning approval? Enough red tape there to make anyone's head spin into adulthood!
All architects worship at the altar of black turtlenecks? Nope!
Sketches everywhere but CAD reigns supreme nowadays – goodbye drafting boards!
It's like everyone expects you're suddenly holding map that has all roads leading to 'Settled & Sorted'. Plot twist - some are just doodling their own paths! 🙃
